subject: Tennis
Blacks
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Richard Williams, the father of Venus and Serena, called Taylor Townsend “one of the best 15-year-olds you can see today in America or I think in the world.”
snippet: Richard Williams, the father of Venus and Serena, called Taylor Townsend “one of the best 15-year-olds you can see today in America or I think in the world.”
